title: The Curious history of money
creator_credit: Larkin Studios, Barclays Bank, Hester Coblentz, Jenny Brisbane, Anne Jolliffe and Beryl Stevens
brief_description: An animated reconstruction of the history of money, credit and financial institutions, illustrating the elementary principles involved and the growth of modern practice.
